name: Soda King
description:
Conceit

Step on flavor tiles to change your flavor. Getting hit by soda of a different flavor will hurt you. Getting hit by soda of your same flavor will charge your soda gauge. Spend charges to use powerful soda attacks. Each flavor has a different attack.

Featuring...
  • 4 biomes with random elements
  • 4 special attacks
  • 9 unique enemies
  • 6 bosses
  • hardcore mode
  • soft roguelite elements

This is a project I started in Aug 2020. My original plan was for it to be a quarantine project and I'd finish it real fast while everything was shut down. I ended up shelving it from Sept 2020 until Oct 2021 and now I'm releasing it in Feb 2022 so that didn't really work out but I guess this virus is still around too.
